snippet.title: Welcome to the Mega Man Mania!!
snippet.description:
Mega Man Mania is a fan project that aims to remaster and colorize the five Mega Man titles on Game Boy.
Once the five games are released, work will also begin on a compilation for the GBA.

Available now:
- Mega Man World: Dr. Wily's Revenge GBC - https://www.romhacking.net/hacks/7492/
- Mega Man World 2 GBC - https://www.romhacking.net/hacks/8688/
- Mega Man World 3 DX - https://www.marcrobledo.com/game-boy/mega-man-world-3-dx/
- Mega Man World 4 DX - https://www.marcrobledo.com/game-boy/mega-man-world-4-dx/
- Mega Man World 5 DX - https://www.marcrobledo.com/game-boy/mega-man-world-5-dx/

Songs used in the trailer:
- [Mega Man Maker] MMII - Quint / 40Nix - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-5o-_-eDHrA-
- [Mega Man Maker] MMIII - Punk - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=woThNp1tEa4-
- [Mega Man Maker] MMIV - Wily Battleship Stage - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vFJvxti-X7U




*Footage seen here belongs to beta versions, graphics are subject to change.


Original Mega Man character and games by Capcom.
These are fan created remasters, no copyright or trademark infringement is intended.
We are not affiliated nor endorsed by Capcom.
